text: The Central Counties Air Operations Unit is a joint consortium established to provide police aviation for Staffordshire Police and West Mercia Police. It operates a Eurocopter EC135 from Wolverhampton Halfpenny Green Airport in Bobbington, South Staffordshire. The unit was closed by the National Police Air Service on 1 January 2016 in order to provide a "better service". ==See also== * Police aviation * Police aviation in the United Kingdom ==References== Category:Police aviation units of the United Kingdom
title: Central Counties Air Operations Unit
